title: AD or AP Evelynn Better?
body:
Hello,

I was recently looking through the patch 5.13 changes and i just have a small question and i was hoping for some players to give their input. As you can probably tell, I was wondering whether either AD or AP Eve was better? I know that with the currently changed AP items you can build including Liandry's Torment and Rylai's with the new runeglaive helping her out too.

However alternatively, the Warrior enchant with possibly Black Clever and  Tri Force could create a solid all around AD bruiser jungler.

Please share your experiences about going down either option or just what you think works best for her kit and for the current meta.

-NuckkFugget (OCE)

replies.body: if you are going to play Evelynn Jungle AP will probably be better because of the item runeglaive.

Neither, the best way to play evelynn is hybrid. Check out guide below, all credit to _Sylvant_.
